quotes.quote: Life is an expression of the sum total of our beliefs. Believe in faith.
Expression is the mystery of beauty.
If you have the words, there's always a chance that you'll find the way.
Expression is the essence of thought.
Sometimes you don't need words to say something your silence is enough to convey your message.
Love and express your feelings to the people you love when you still have the time to do so.
The expression a woman wears on her face is far more important than the clothes she wears on her back.
The truest expression of a people is in its dances and its music. Bodies never lie.
Emotion constantly finds expression in bodily position.
The expression of your heart is beating beneath your fears.
Feelings or emotions are the universal language and are to be honored. They are the authentic expression of who you are at your deepest place.
All expression of truth does at length take this deep ethical form.
If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all.
Our self-expression is meant to be a manifestation of the silence of our hearts.
Freedom of expression comes with responsibilities, especially when it comes with serious implications for peace.
The expression of gratitude for whatever blessing you receive from God here on earth can only be in Joy.
Your attitude is an expression of your values, beliefs and expectations.
Creative expression is not just a means of getting attention, although some have approached art that way. Think of art as a way of connecting, of sharing your insights with others.
To express one's inner self so that others can understand you, is art. If your expressions are elevated and beautiful, it is good art.
It is important to express oneself, provided the feelings are real and are taken from your own experience.
Expression is a function of intention and intention emanates from your thought faculty.
A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.
Unexpressed emotions will never die. They are buried alive and will come forth later in uglier ways.
Expression and the right to express is vital, anyone can be artistic.
Modest expression is a beautiful setting to the diamond of talent and genius.
Self-expression must pass into communication for its fulfillment.
There is something of the essence of creative expression that informs and transcends all its manifestations â€“ and when you touch it magic!
Happiness is an expression of the soul in considered actions.
Expression that comes from the deepest, darkest place that most of us would rather hide from the rest of the world is the substance that will most likely also deeply affect others.
Forgiveness is a powerful expression of the love within our soul.
Say what you feel, it's not being rude. It's being real. Better be truthful than illusive.
The expression of preferences is the essence of love.
Caring for others is an expression of what it means to be fully human.
Expression is the dress of thought.
The most perfect expression of human behavior is a string quartet.
Expression alone can invest beauty with supreme and lasting command over the eye.
Expressing gratitude to others can increase our self esteem.When gratitude becomes way of life success, satisfaction and happiness makes feeling of fullness.
Expression, to a great extent, is a matter of terms, and terms are anyone's.
Sometimes expressing yourself fully helps to let go faster. So cry, laugh, scream when you need to.
Self expression is a function of responsibility.
Self-expression must pass into communication for its fulfillment
Exaggerated sensitiveness is an expression of the feeling of inferiority.
Self-expression is always a right, but its still not there to be abused.
Total freedom of expression does not compensate for lack of talent.
Expression is never helped by suppression.
Every expression of desired friendship has potential bite. Every smile reveals the teeth.
Expression is when you are at one with nothingness.
Emotions become more violent when expression is stifled.
Great art is the outward expression of an inner life in the artist, and this inner life will result in his personal vision of the world.
The world is not ready for some people when they show up, but that shouldn't stop anyone.
